ComicInfo.Summary:
A vacationing family finds a monster in a swamp!
*I Found Monstrom! The Dweller in the Black Swamp!* A reprinted story from Tales to Astonish #11.
*I Am the Man Who Will...Destroy Your World!* A reprinted story from Strange Tales #71.
*I-Am-the-Genie!* A reprinted story from Tales to Astonish #8.
*I Was Face-to-Face With the Forbidden Robot!* A reprinted story from Tales to Astonish #11.
*What Was the Strange Power of Simon Drudd!* A reprinted story from Tales to Astonish #10.
*Something Lurks Inside!* A reprinted story from Tales to Astonish #10.
*Only I Know When the World Will End!* A reprinted story from Tales to Astonish #10.
*I Fought the Man Who Couldn't Be Killed* A reprinted story from Strange Tales #71.
*Mummex---King of the Mummies!* A reprinted story from Tales to Astonish #8.
ComicInfo.Title: I Found Monstrom, the Dweller in the Black Swamp!
